header.heading: Where
header.subtitle: I operate from these gyms, but I'm flexible — let's find what works for you.

flexible.heading: I'm Flexible
flexible.body: While I primarily train from the two locations above, I'm happy to discuss alternative arrangements. Whether it's outdoor training, a local park, or your home gym — just ask.
flexible.body_2: I also offer full online coaching if you can't make it to a gym in person.

cta.heading: Want to Train at One of These Locations?
cta.body: Get in touch and I'll sort out the rest.
